Event handler/listener that fires from the Add button and directs to the AddAppointmentView screen.

Event handler/listener that fires from the add Appointment button and attempts to create and add the appointment and it's field details to the local cache and database.

Deletes the selected Appointment on the Appointment Table and updates the MySQL database accordingly.

onModifyAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Application.Controllers.MainMenuController
Event handler/listener that fires from the Modify button and directs to the EditAppointmentView screen assigning the ModifyAppointmentController.selectedAppointment to the selected Appointment on the Appointment table or alerts the user to make a valid selection.

Event handler/listener that fires from the Modify button and attempts to update the associated appointment and it's field details to the local cache and database.
onModifyCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class Application.Controllers.MainMenuController
Event handler/listener that fires from the Modify button and directs to the ModifyCustomerView screen assigning the ModifyCustomerController.selectedCustomer to the selected Customer on the Customer table or alerts the user to make a valid selection.

Event handler/listener that fires from the Modify button and attempts to save and update the associated Customer with the field input to the local cache and database.
